title: CA suspends Puttalam High Court Judge’s order to jail lady lawyer
byline: In a swift response to an urgent appeal, the Court of Appeal today issued an interim order suspending the decision made by the Puttalam High Court Judge to remand a lady lawyer over an alleged contemptuous conduct.

title: Deaths from devastating earthquake in Myanmar climb past 1,700
byline: The death toll from the earthquake that hit Myanmar has risen to more than 1,700 as more bodies have been pulled from the rubble, the country’s military-led government said Monday.

title: Person found dead at luxury hotel in Colombo
byline: Police have launched an investigation after an individual was found dead at a luxury hotel near Galle Face Green.

title: Shammi Silva re-elected as SLC President
byline: Shammi Silva has been re-elected as the President of Sri Lanka Cricket for the 2025–2027 term.

title: HIV cases hit record high in Sri Lanka
byline: Sri Lanka has experienced a significant surge in HIV/AIDS cases in 2024 recording over 800 cases.

title: Colombo’s skyscrapers are built to withstand earthquakes – Seismologist
byline: Although Sri Lanka is not typically considered a high-seismic zone, the mushrooming skyscrapers in Colombo are safe from any unexpected earthquake, as they are built using such structural technology, a seismologist said.

title: Construction activity in Sri Lanka continues to expand in February
byline: Sri Lanka’s construction sector continued to expand in February, with increased construction activity reported by most respondents, according to the Central Bank.
